title: [請願] 西人記者叫我地去寫信玩鳩兩個落order 打人既西人警察

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/RichScotford5/posts/1856842841083690?__tn__=-R
條link 要login 左facebook先睇到
佢個wall:(好似唔需要login，但要自己scroll 去搵返岩既post)
https://www.facebook.com/RichScotford5/


「
Have received lots of posts and messages suggesting contacting UK Gov about these Pension Sellout Pigs. Well, reality is, the UK Gov sells them weapons and trains them in high level surveillance, so that's a real long shot at the moment.
What I would recommend is to start much closer to home, with the HK Rugby Association. A petition, in Chinese, to the Association would be a great place to start. These people do not represent the values of the game.
BE WARNED: The HK Rugby Association is basically run by and heavily influenced by ex-HK police. They are not going to take kindly to being dragged into all of this. I already received a shit-storm of abuse from the expat clique in Sai Kung about how I'm upsetting a tiny community, and I should drop it. The Sai Kung clique can tolerate HK kids being shot from behind, and a feign sympathy, but don't bring this to the community. The bubble has to be protected at all costs.
Well, No,
And here's why...
These PENSION SELLOUTS are not simple coppers following orders as their friends like to claim. They are the one's that work out the strategic and tactical plans in these operations. They OWN IT. There is not a single detail they are not aware of. Yes, Curry Lam gives the ultimate nod for violence, but she is not asking for out of control baton attacks, using pepper spray against recommended regulations, firing plastic bullets at unarmed people, who are moving away, attacking the press, assaulting people who are compliant or injured, using shields as offensive weapons, or any other number of violent and illegal policing that is on full, public display. These commanders took on the job and they can and should be held publicly accountable for their actions.
As I write, these commanders are planning operations to counter more protests this weekend. Most probably with more violence, not less.
They are morally accountable for their actions. Disciplined service officers can refuse assignments. They have the choice to say, this assignment is not for me. I have a young family, I'm integrated into the community, this will be too inflammatory. For the sake of my family I will not do this. You will have to find someone else. But, this doesn't happen. Instead, they accept it, bask in it, then rally their closeted communities to protect them when large swathes of the community demand they own it.
The HK Rugby Association is a good place to start.
」
E個居港外藉writer 一直有報開香港抗爭新聞，佢facebook 仲用左天倚BB做profile pic添。
頭先係facebook 見到佢捉左兩個西人出呢屌，話佢地係食班只想食香港退休金既屎忽鬼，幾個post都同成件事有關，而且全部都係英文，有時個writer 會係comment 補返幾句
有興趣既巴絲可以追吓post，但我見到有條友係comment用中文總結左少少野就直接copy 過呢
「
E個外國writer 話圖中兩個鬼佬好可能係今次落命令警方用暴力方式打人既commander。(半firm?)
佢篤左出呢之後係西貢fusion買野，比對方家眷為難。
佢指出西貢有一班西人，大部份都係ex-HK police，而且 The HK Rugby Association 同佢地關係深厚。
佢一個人無法子係香港西人社會做到D咩，佢建議香港人用中文向 The HK Rugby Association 聯署，捉個兩個鬼佬屌(鬧)又好、要求佢地表態又好反對警方使用過度武力又好，總之咁做可以比返D demage 個兩件賣港西人。
」
個西人就話The HK Rugby Association係西人眼中係好重要既社交活動。
寫信去數臭E兩年垃圾可以比到壓力佢全家同其他支持警方既離地西人，平時成日講禍必及妻兒既你又點可以錯過E個機會?
有請願信既template 既google doc link，中意可以照抄、唔中意任你改完再upload
可以email / 係 The HK Rugby Association 個網到reply
(記得係底打返自己名同日期)

replies.msg:
黑警全部罪無可恕
但罪都有分輕重，戰犯都唔係個個一樣刑罰
E兩隻野係重犯，佢地既罪絕對比一般黑警重，target 佢地好合理
至於777定CCP，無一個係無辜的 (講真依 5年我連泛民都討厭埋)
但其實個鬼佬咁強調個兩隻野
1. 佢地大家都係西人，佢睇唔過眼
2. 佢係前線做記者，自然同黑警有更多矛盾
3. 佢唔係中國人，成日諗光復香港、支爆、天滅中共之類，但佢一定係支持民主自己既人

我自己就覺得香港人可以multi tasking
寫完封信可以繼續去做其他野

發夢有公務員講：FAX去公務員事務局投訴，警察會無得撈，無退休金，仲要坐監
公務員事務局
傳 真 : 2868 5069
電 郵 : csbcomp@csb.gov.hk

以下係夢境資料，隱約記得：
1. 投訴警察開槍, 過份使用武力, 執法不公, FAX + EMAIL, 之後會有人跟進, 勁過警監會好多, 未過試用期警察多數88加刑事 , 舊制既公務員隨時連退休金都無埋
2. 必須寫清楚警察名同編號 (用呢條link查https://police-github.github.io/)
3. 要用正式方法送佢地一程, Fax + email 最好, Email 補資料, 呢個直接影響升遷甚至炒人，要開board, 唔好用1823
4. 可以叫議員寫仲快處理, 列為Urgent 處理

感謝師兄的熱心

剛已用分身email寄出~
